{{cpp/types/numeric_limits/title|has_denorm}}
{{cpp/types/numeric_limits/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}{{dcl rev begin}}
{{dcl | until=c++11 |
static const std::float_denorm_style has_denorm;
}}
{{dcl | since=c++11 | deprecated=c++23 |
static constexpr std::float_denorm_style has_denorm;
}}
{{dcl rev end}}

The value of {{c|std::numeric_limits&lt;T&gt;::has_denorm}} identifies the floating-point types that support [[enwiki:Denormal number|subnormal values]].
